1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Dataset as a set of judges.
4--
5--   Dataset is like a bridge of judges and relations.
6--   We can get a relation from a dataset,
7--   that dataset is build from judges.
8
9module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Dataset
10  ( Dataset,
11    datasetClasses,
12    dataset,
13    datasetAdd,
14    readDataset,
15  ) where
16
17import qualified Data.Map.Strict                         as Ms
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                as O
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                    as B
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                  as S
21import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                    as T
22import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Class              as D
23import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Content     as D
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Decode.Term        as D
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern          as P
26
27-- | Dataset is a set of judges.
28data Dataset c = Dataset (Ms.Map S.JudgeClass [[S.Term c]])
29
30instance Show (Dataset c) where
31    show = showDataset
32
33showDataset :: Dataset c -> String
34showDataset (Dataset ds) =
35    "Dataset { " ++ B.intercalate " | " (desc <$> Ms.assocs ds) ++ " }"
36        where desc (cl, ts) = let ns  = B.uniqueConcat (fst O.<$$> ts)
37                                  s   = unwords (S.termNameString <$> ns)
38                                  n   = show (length ts)
39                              in n ++ " * " ++ cl ++ " " ++ s
40
41-- | Dataset that has no judges.
42instance B.Default (Dataset c) where
43    def = Dataset Ms.empty
44
45instance T.SelectRel Dataset where
46    selectRel = datasetSelect B.def
47
48-- | Retrieve judgement class and its term names.
49datasetClasses :: Dataset c -> Ms.Map S.JudgeClass [S.TermName]
50datasetClasses (Dataset ds) = Ms.map termName ds where
51    termName ts = B.uniqueConcat (fst O.<$$> ts)
52
53-- | Gather judges into a dataset.
54dataset :: [T.Judge c] -> Dataset c
55dataset js = datasetAdd js B.def
56
57-- | Add judges to dataset.
58datasetAdd :: [T.Judge c] -> O.Map (Dataset c)
59datasetAdd js ds = foldr addJudge ds js
60
61-- | Add a judge to dataset.
62addJudge :: T.Judge c -> O.Map (Dataset c)
63addJudge (T.JudgeAffirm cl xs) (Dataset ds1) = Dataset ds2 where
64    ds2 = Ms.insertWith add cl [xs] ds1
65    add new old = new ++ old
66addJudge _ _ = undefined
67
68-- | Select relation from dataset.
69--   If a given term is not in judges, first argument is used.
70datasetSelect :: (Ord c) => c -> Dataset c -> T.RelSelect c
71datasetSelect filler (Dataset ds) cl ns = T.Rel he bo where
72    he = T.headFrom ns
73    bo = case Ms.lookup cl ds of
74           Just set -> B.unique (pickContents filler ns <$> set)
75           Nothing  -> []
76
77pickContents :: c -> [S.TermName] -> [S.Term c] -> [c]
78pickContents filler ns ts = map pick ns where
79    pick n = B.fromMaybe filler $ lookup n ts
80
81-- | Read file and convert to dataset.
82--
83--   >>> readDataset "foo.k" :: Koshucode.Baala.Base.IOAb DatasetC
84--   Right Dataset { 3 * A /x /y | 2 * B /y /z | 1 * C /z }
85--
86readDataset :: (D.CContent c) => FilePath -> B.IOAb (Dataset c)
87readDataset path =
88    do ts' <- S.readClauseTrees path
89       case ts' of
90         Left a   -> return $ Left a
91         Right ts -> case clauseJudges ts of
92                       Left a   -> return $ Left a
93                       Right js -> return $ Right $ dataset js
94
95clauseJudges :: (D.CContent c) => [[S.Tree]] -> B.Ab [T.Judge c]
96clauseJudges = loop D.cacheT [] where
97    loop cc js ((P.L (P.TBar "|--") : P.LRaw cl : ts) : ls) =
98        do (cc', j) <- D.treesJudge cc T.AssertAffirm cl ts
99           loop cc' (j : js) ls
100    loop _ js [] = Right js
101    loop _ _ ls  = B.abortable "clause" ls $ Left $ B.abortBecause "Except judgement"
102
